com.riskgame.service

Interface RiskPlayInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RiskPlayImpl

    public interface RiskPlayInterface
    This is a interface of RiskPlayGame buiness logic. Where reinforcement,attack and fortification happens.
    Author:
    Zankhanaben Patel
    See Also:
    RiskMap, Player, RiskCardExchange, RiskCard, com.riskgame.model.PlayerTerritory
